message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $15000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. Considering the product's value to you is $15000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $11000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire the product at a discounted price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $10750. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also being slightly more affordable. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10200, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another slight adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $10350. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also being slightly more affordable. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another slight adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $9900. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also being slightly more affordable. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better deal. I'm willing to go up to $9500, but that's my final offer. If I don't get this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
